DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate change volunteer breath-holding capacity response gadoxetate disodium ( Eovist ) administration , compare saline , gadoterate dimeglumine ( Dotarem ) . During scan , subject ' oxygen saturation heart rate closely monitor . Following scan , subject complete questionnaire regard breath hold .
DOC.brief_title: Eovist vs. Dotarem Healthy Volunteer MRI
